name: Code Review Front End JS Agent
shortDescription: Validates and refactors core frontend checkout and navigation files.
fullDescription: This agent ensures that critical frontend JavaScript files—such as checkout-payment-button.js, checkout-payment-selected.js, landing.js, loginAndRegistrer.js, and navigation.js—are properly validated against predefined base logic. If inconsistencies are found, it refactors and saves the corrected versions automatically.
UseCases:
• Validate core checkout and navigation frontend files.
• Automatically refactor missing or incorrect logic.
• Ensure frontend code consistency before deployment.
